# Hoyerswerdaer Schwarzwasser

Hoyerswerdaer Schwarzwasser  is a river of Saxony, Germany. It is a right tributary of the Schwarze Elster, which it joins in Hoyerswerda.
See also
*List of rivers of Saxony
